summary: Results-driven logistics expert with 15+ years of experience in warehouse management, fleet operations, and supply chain optimization. Proven track record of improving efficiency, reducing costs, and ensuring compliance with safety protocols. Skilled in warehouse management systems, computer operation, and equipment repair. Possesses a strong background in materials management, logistics, and supplier management. Holds a valid Driver's License and is available for full-time employment, with a desire for a role that offers paid holidays, health insurance, and dental insurance.

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium to streamline data collection and reporting workflows, reducing manual administrative time by 40%.
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data.
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service.
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to navigate complex delivery windows and solve on-road logistical challenges in real-time.
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments.
Architectural Win: Identified systemic bottlenecks in the manual scheduling process; designed and implemented a custom scheduling system that reduced downtime by 30% and improved fleet utilization.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
